title: Presidential Election: Nawaz Sharif casts his vote
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 09 (APP): Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif, the Quaid of the Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz (PML-N), cast his vote on Saturday during the presidential elections conducted in the National Assembly hall.
Upon his arrival at the hall, supporters from both the PML-N and the Pakistan Peopleâ€™s Party (PPP) gathered around him.
Shortly after casting his vote, Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif left the hall.
